title: Rune page bundle
body:
As in some times before, we are offered the possibility to buy a 2-page rune bundle. In previous times I bought similar bundles but this time I can't do it. Is this a bug or is it really blocked to people who previously bought such bundles?
If it's a bug, how can I fix it (or will Riot fix it)? 
Thanks you for the help

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure I know what your specific issue is.  When you click on the bundle to buy it, do you get a particular error message?  Can you take a screenshot of this error?

Let me know!
